attributes.additional_details: Israel has violated international law by killing over 1000 civilian palestinians, many of them were children and women, the destruction of homes , the brutalisation of the population of Gaza, the collective punishment of a civilian innocent population are intollerable. For all these reasons, the British government should impose economic sanctions on israel and start the pressure on this criminal state to stop the murderous war on the civilian population of Gaza and  end the blocade on Gaza.
